name: OSUMSMART
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light”
”Alexa, set fan to 20 percent”
”Alexa, set background color to orange”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is developed to provide control for OSUM Smart Innovations range of Smart Switches and Controllers powering the true end to end automation solution for residential and commercial spaces, with SL-BUS Technology. This Action will enable control of all OSUM's products and solutions through a voice interface, thereby providing a higher level of convenience and control to the end-users. Additionally, these products can also be controlled and managed by Application - OSUMONE and manual control thereby providing users with complete 360-degree control of their spaces.
Once you have products installed at your end, you will need a VDCloud Login Credentials to access these devices from alexa.
